OOC: Ahem, Instrat didn't come from a pod.

BIC: Instrat bent over backwards, but stayed on her feet, thus avoiding the
rifle shot. (ala Prime Time Elix Skipper) She bent back upwards.

Instrat: 2...against 1? You have such honor, I mean, 2 taking on one like
that, it's the most honorable thing I've ever seen.

Instrat lowered her scythe and one of her optics dimmed and faded out,
because of the damage done to her head. Instrat waited for Carnage to
respond...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 8:31 PM
Subject: Carnage



( Carnage: Alright.)

** Carnage growled and ducked under Instrat's scythe, snapping her jaws
towards the blade after she ducked.
Was this bot crazy, or just looking for a good fight?!
Well, whatever it was, it was going to get a fight anyway!**

" Carnage! TRANSFORM!"

** And with that she dropped the kill and quickly transformed into robot
mode, reaching behind her and quickly drawing a rapid-fire rifle. Her optics
narrowed as she lined up her target with the berrel of her weapon.
Just then there was a crashing of brush and a familier scent, seconds later
a friend appeared out of the surrounding brush, aiming her dart gun towards
Instrat.
Teltoli!
It had been a while since she had seen the femm, and it was good to see her.
She couldn't have picked a better time to suddenly jump back into her life.
But now was no time for welcome hellos, there was this bot to deal with.
But then Carnage caught quick movement by Instrat, watching it's suddenly
reach down and grab at Teltoli's legs.
Carnage growled.**

" Watch it!"

** Carnage growled and fired her rifle, aiming first towards Instrat's
chest, where she was more likely to hit then it's chest.
She knew that it would be easier to simply talk this out, but this bot
seemed to be bent on killing her just because she had killed in turn to
survive.
The bots that were coming out of pods these days!**
